class  BtHfAtChldOneCommand

Detailed Description

BtHfService is implemented as a singleton. Offers the functionality for dial up networks and so extends the basic functionality, it depends on BtHfController who forms the low level interface to the Bluetooth Stack.

Member Function Documentation

BtRequestState BtHfService::ConnectRequest (   )  [virtual]
 

Establish connection for the device set for this service.

ConnectRequest sends a device connect request down to the BtHfController for execution. On successfull execution of this request an ACL connection for the device set for this serivce will be established. The progress of the ongoing request is signalled to the OnRequestStateChange member function.

Returns:
A BtRequestState containing the current state of the requested operation.

Implements BtAudioAccessoryService.

BtRequestState BtHfService::DisconnectRequest (   )  [virtual]
 

Release connection for the device set for this service.

ConnectRequest sends a device disconnect request down to the BtHfController for execution. On successfull execution of this request the ACL connection for the device set for this serivce will be released. The progress of the ongoing request is signalled to the OnRequestStateChange member function.

Returns:
A BtRequestState containing the current state of the requested operation.

Implements BtAudioAccessoryService.

Implements BtAudioAccessoryService.

BtProfile BtHfService::GetProfile (   )  const [virtual]
 

Get the profile this service is associated with.

GetProfile returns the profile for which this service provides the interface.

Returns:
A BtProfile enumeration type containing the profile this service is associated with.

void BtHfService::Init (   )  [virtual]
 

Initalize the hands free service.

Init has to be called to make the service running. It adds itself as a dispatcher to the active application and registers the the necessary messages.

BOOLEAN BtHfService::IsConnected (   )  const [virtual]
 

Returns the connected state of device set for this service.

IsConnected returns whether the device set for this service has an ACL connection established or not.

Returns:
TRUE ACL connection established.
FALSE ACL connection not established.

Implements BtAudioAccessoryService.

BOOLEAN BtHfService::OnMessage (  const Message &  message  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Every message routed to a dispatcher may be treated in OnMessage.

Returns:
TRUE is returned, if the message has been dispatched.

Implements Dispatcher.

void BtHfService::RegisterMessages (   )  const [protected, virtual]
 

This method is invoked as soon as the user dispatcher is added to an execution context by ExecutionContext::AddDispatcher(). The derived user dispatcher should register all messages it wants to receive.

Reimplemented from UserDispatcher.

void BtHfService::SetTargetDevice (  const BtDevice &  target_device  )  [virtual]
 

Sets the remote device this service addresses.

Each BtService class addresses exactly one remote device. For profiles supporting more than one remote device there must be more than one instance of that prarticular service.
SetTargetDevice sets the remote device, that this service addresses.

Parameters:
target_device A reference to a BtDevice containing the remote device this service should address.

Reimplemented from BtService.

void BtHfService::UnregisterMessages (   )  const [protected, virtual]
 

This method is invoked as soon as the user dispatcher is removed from an execution context by ExecutionContext::RemoveDispatcher(). The derived user dispatcher should unregister all messages it has registered inside UserDispatcher::RegisterMessages().

Reimplemented from UserDispatcher.
